name: Santa Claus Puzzle - Cute Christmas - Free
name_original: Santa Claus Puzzle - Cute Christmas - Free
description:
Best known from radio and TV!
We have styled the classics into brand new top apps!
Old Games - Brand New!

Can you solve all the jigsaws? Find out - fun for all ages! This app comes with a set of 10 amazing pictures and different difficulties! Puzzle your favorite image.
Yes, it is Free!
